content.text: It's going well, thanks! I met Jimmy Fallon the other day, it was really cool. How about you?
Oh wow! That's awesome, I'm jealous! I'm doing well, I just found out my coworker was stealing money from the company, so that's a bummer.
Oh no, that's terrible! I'm sorry to hear that.
It's okay, I'm sure we'll be able to figure it out. On the bright side, I get to watch UFC fights on the weekends, so that's pretty cool.
Yeah, that's always fun! I love watching MMA, too. I also like to watch mystery movies, so we have a few things in common.
Oh, that's cool! I love mystery movies, too. My favorite movie is The Sixth Sense.
Oh, that's a good one! I love that movie, too. I also like The Silence of the Lambs.
Yeah, that's a good one, too. I'm glad to meet someone else who likes mystery movies.
Me too! I feel like they're not as popular as they used to be, but I still love them.
